name: Realm Royale - Starter Pack
detailed_description:
Whether you’re a new player or a Realm Royale veteran, this Starter Pack is the perfect way to dive into action! This pack allows you to strut your stuff with the all-new Majestic Peabok chicken skin and emulate your favorite Zeppelin captain with the Cap’n Wissles emote. The starter pack also includes 800 Crowns, which can be used in the Realm Royale Shop to purchase additional cosmetic items like character skins, emotes, and mounts.

The Realm Royale Starter Pack includes:
800 Crowns
The Majestic Peabok Chicken Skin
Cap’n Wissles Emote

short_description: Whether you’re a new player or a Realm Royale veteran, this Starter Pack is the perfect way to dive into action! This pack allows you to strut your stuff with the all-new Majestic Peabok chicken skin and emulate your favorite Zeppelin captain with the Cap’n Wissles emote.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Polish, Russian, Portuguese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2320 CPU @ 3.00 GHz (4 CPUs), ~3.0GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 555
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
